mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_METTING WHERE (START < #{start} AND #{start} < END) OR (START < #{end} AND #{end} < END) OR (#{start} <= START AND END <= #{end})

SELECT A.METTINGROOMNAME, A.DATE, A.GUBUN, B.START, B.END, B.USER, B.CYCLECOUNT FROM (SELECT A.METTINGROOMNAME, B.DATE, B.GUBUN, B.START, B.END, B.CYCLE FROM TB_METTING_ROOM A, (SELECT #{date} DATE, 'MORNING' GUBUN, '000000' START, '115959' END, 0 CYCLE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT #{date} DATE, 'AFTERNOON' GUBUN, '120000' START, '235959' END, 0 CYCLE FROM DUAL) B) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_METTING B ON A.METTINGROOMNAME = B.METTINGROOMNAME AND SUBSTR(B.START,9) BETWEEN A.START AND A.END AND B.CYCLECOUNT = A.CYCLE AND B.START BETWEEN CONCAT(#{date},'000000') AND CONCAT(#{date},'235959') UNION ALL SELECT A.METTINGROOMNAME, A.DATE, A.GUBUN, B.START, B.END, B.USER, B.CYCLECOUNT FROM (SELECT A.METTINGROOMNAME, B.DATE, B.GUBUN, B.START, B.END, B.CYCLE FROM TB_METTING_ROOM A, (SELECT #{date} DATE, 'CYCLE' GUBUN , '000000' START, '235959' END, 1 CYCLE FROM DUAL) B) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_METTING B ON A.METTINGROOMNAME = B.METTINGROOMNAME AND SUBSTR(B.START,9) BETWEEN A.START AND A.END AND B.CYCLECOUNT >= A.CYCLE AND B.START BETWEEN CONCAT(#{date},'000000') AND CONCAT(#{date},'235959') ORDER BY METTINGROOMNAME, DATE, GUBUN
